item.description:
Hello Everyone!

Lets welcome the spring together at McFadden'r Restaurant and Saloon in Providence! We will have a separate spot reserved for us at the bar from 6 - 9 p.m. McFadden's will serve us a complimentary round of appetizers and following appetizers for half price... drinks can be purchased for $ 3 - jay!!!

Of course we can stay at the bar after 9 p.m. as well, if we like, for dinner and more drinks and more good chats!

Hope many of you can make it. New members - please come, we all would like to get to know you!!!

Sounds good? Then don't wait and sign up immediately!!

Looking forward to seeing you all! Bis bald!

- Hanna
item.name: May Meetup at McFadden's Restaurant & Saloon
